group_1.textRight: Pardon the intrusion!

group_1.textLeft: Come on in, come on in!@This place is as cramped as ever, but...

group_1.textRight: Sorry for barging in on such@short notice.

group_1.textLeft: No, no! You’re always welcome@here, Kokoro!

group_1.textRight: Big sis Kokoro is here!
Welcome!
Have any more cake?

group_1.textLeft: Hey! Don’t be rude!@We got cake the other day!

group_1.textRight: [chara:801300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]But...but big sis Kokoro’s@cake is so delicious!
Hehe, thank you.
But I didn’t bring a cake today...
[flashEffect:flashWhite1]Instead, I’m here to share some of@the mountain’s bounty with you!
I went on a themed hike about the wild@plants you can harvest from the mountains.
I gathered a lot more than I@thought I would, but…
I only have three people in my family,@and we can’t eat all of this by ourselves.
I’d like you to have it.

group_1.textLeft: If you really want me to...@[chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302001:motion_400][chara:302001:cheek_1][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]it’s more than welcome!
With this much food, we can have@an extra side dish today...
No! It means we can have extra@side dishes for a while!

group_1.textRight: Yay!@Lots of side dishes!
We can have one of them@“luxurious banquet” things!
Hehe, that’s good!

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, Kokoro,@you’ve been doing that a lot lately.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: Not to say you didn’t do it a bunch before, but@recently, you’ve been doing it even more, right?

group_1.textRight: Hehe, that’s right.
I have a friend who’s been going@climbing with me lately.
It just reminded me of how much@fun it is to go with someone else.
Maybe that’s why I’m enjoying it@more than ever!
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah!
(Masara...@I can’t thank you enough.)
